title: Fallen Warrior: Fallen Trilogy book 3
description: They say life can bloom from ashes and death. Life maybe. But can Love do the same?A great warrior, a dead friend, a dark stranger, and a broken princess. In Fallen Warrior, the epic final installment of the Fallen Trilogy, all must turn to a forgotten legend to find hope. But can Ellia, ruler of Shaundakul turned Chimera warrior, sum up the strength of will to retrieve this legend's power? Hasn't Cyric's betrayal destroyed her completely? All is darkness and shadow. Do you know what makes the stars shine the brightest?
author: Tess   Williams
